The claim involves the death of Dr: Dean Lorich, a well-known orthopedic surgeon, who was found dead in his home from a self-inflicted knife wound on December 10, 2017.
Dr: Lorich had volunteered in Haiti as part of a relief effort led by the Clinton Foundation after the 2010 earthquake.
The claim suggests that Dr: Lorich exposed corruption and malpractice by the Clinton Foundation during his time in Haiti and voiced his concerns directly to Hillary Clinton.
The Your News Wire article: which propagated the claim, heavily implies that the Clintons were responsible for Dr. Lorich's death, although it never explicitly makes that claim.
